alert.note: Alert for Baker County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 12:50PM PST until January 18 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM MST /8 PM PST/ TUESDAY TO 8 AM MST /7 AM PST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches, except 8 to 20 inches over the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph on Thursday morning in the mountains. * WHERE...Portions of southwest and west central Idaho and northeast Oregon, including the West-Central Mountains, Boise Mountains, Weiser Basin, Camas Prairie, and Baker County Oregon. * WHEN...From 9 PM MST /8 PM PST/ Tuesday to 8 AM MST /7 AM PST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
